titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for the vessel ISLAND GIRL.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

bill.summary: 7/23/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
